c:capability.name: IrrigationSchedulable
c:capability.c:description: Methods for pushing irrigation schedules to the device.

c:attribute.name: refreshSchedule
c:attribute.description: If true then the device needs to schedule synchronized with the platform.

c:method.name: DisableSchedule
c:method.description: Disables schedulig on the device for an optional amount of time

c:parameter.name: duration
c:parameter.description: The duration in minutes to disable the schedule. -1 implies indefinitely

c:method.name: ClearEvenOddSchedule
c:method.description: Clears the even/odd day schedule for the given zone

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to clear

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:method.name: SetEvenOddSchedule
c:method.description: Sets an even/odd day schedule for the given zone

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to set the schedule on

c:parameter.name: even
c:parameter.description: true for an even day schedule, false for an odd day

c:parameter.name: transitions
c:parameter.description: Each transition to set containing startTime and duration

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:method.name: ClearIntervalSchedule
c:method.description: Clears the interval schedule for the given zone

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to clear

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:method.name: SetIntervalSchedule
c:method.description: Sets an interval schedule for the given zone

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to set the schedule on

c:parameter.name: days
c:parameter.description: The number of days in the interval

c:parameter.name: transitions
c:parameter.description: Each transition to set containing startTime and duration

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to set the interval start on

c:parameter.name: startDate
c:parameter.description: The timestamp of the day on which the interval schedule should start

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:method.name: ClearWeeklySchedule
c:method.description: Clears the weekly schedule for the given zone

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to clear

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:method.name: SetWeeklySchedule
c:method.description: Sets a weekly schedule for the given zone

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone to set the schedule on

c:parameter.name: days
c:parameter.description: The days to set, each entry will be one of MON,TUE,WED,THU,FRI,SAT or SUN

c:parameter.name: transitions
c:parameter.description: Each transition to set containing startTime and duration

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID, this should be returned in success or failure events for alignment

c:event.name: ScheduleEnabled
c:event.description: Emitted as a result of EnableSchedule

c:event.name: ScheduleApplied
c:event.description: Emitted when a schedule is successfully written to the device

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID that was issued to one of the set schedule methods

c:event.name: ScheduleCleared
c:event.description: Emitted when a schedule is successfully cleared from the device

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID that was issued to one of the clear schedule methods

c:event.name: ScheduleFailed
c:event.description: Emitted when a schedule could not be applied on the device

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID that was issued to one of the set schedule methods

c:event.name: ScheduleClearFailed
c:event.description: Emitted when a schedule failed to be cleared from the device

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID that was issued to one of the clear schedule methods

c:event.name: SetIntervalStartSucceeded
c:event.description: Emitted when setting the interval start date succeeds

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID that was issued to the set interval start method

c:event.name: SetIntervalStartFailed
c:event.description: Emitted when there is a failure to set the interval start date

c:parameter.name: opId
c:parameter.description: The operation ID that was issued to the set interval start method
